abc project name
src mdhi 
bank ani test class

bank class java project

package abc;

public class Bank {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		Customer c= new Customer();
		         c.name = "john";
		         c.address="pune";
		         c.email="john@gmail.com";
		         c.age=22;
		         c.mobNo=4563;
    
	BankingService bs = new BankingService();
	       System.out.println(bs.openAccount(c));

	}

}

class BankingService{
	
	String openAccount(Customer c)
	{
		return c.name + " u r account is opened";
	}
}

class Customer{
  String name;
  String address;
  String email;
  int age;
  int mobNo;
}


package abc;

public class Test {
	
	public static void main(String[] a) {
		
		System.out.println("hello")                                   ;
	    
		Calculator c = new Calculator();
		/*
	    System.out.println(c.add(10,10));
	    System.out.println(c.sub(20,10));
	    */
		int ad = c.add(100,100);
		    System.out.println(ad);
		    
		 
	    
	}

}

class Calculator{
	int add(int a, int b) {
		return a + b;
	}
	
	int sub(int a,int b) {
		return a-b;
	}
}



# Bus service project name
Tes1 class name

public class Test1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Passanger p = new Passanger();
		p.name = "sam";
		p.rout = "Mumbai";
		p.seat = 34;
		p.mobno = 4566733;
		
		BusPassengerService bus = new BusPassengerService();
		bus.PassangerDetails(p);

	}

}

class BusPassengerService{
	public void PassangerDetails(Passanger p) {
		System.out.println(" ---------------------- Passenger Details ---------------------");
		System.out.println("Name: " + p.name);
		System.out.println("Rout:" + p.rout);
		System.out.println("Seat:"+ p.seat);
		System.out.println("MobNo:" + p.mobno);
	   
	}
	
}

class Passanger{
	String name;
	String rout;
	int seat;
	int mobno;
}


# Demo project name java project

src
doctor.java

public class Doctor {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		DoctorID DID = new DoctorID();
		DID.setName("Ram");
		DID.setId (11);
		DID.setSpecialisation("cardiologist");
		DID.setMobileNo(983478245);
		
		
		System.out.println(DID.getName());
		System.out.println(DID.getId());
		System.out.println(DID.getSpecialisation());
		System.out.println(DID.getMobileNo());
		

	}

}

class DoctorID{
    private String Name;
    private int Id;
    private String Specialisation;
    private int MobileNo;
    
    void setName(String n) {
    		Name = n;
    }
    String getName() {
    	return Name;
    	
    }
    
    void setId(int id) {
    	    Id = id;
    }
    int getId() {
    	return Id;
    }
    

    void setSpecialisation(	String specialist ) {
    	    Specialisation = specialist;
    }
    String getSpecialisation () {
    	return Specialisation;
    }
    
    void setMobileNo(int mobno) {
    	    MobileNo = mobno;
    }
    int getMobileNo() {
    	return MobileNo;
    }
    
    
    
    
}

# order details
public class OrderDetails {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		Order o = new Order();
		      o.setid(101);
		      o.setdate(221023);
		      o.setlocation("latur");
		      o.setprice(500);
		      
       System.out.println(o.getid());
       System.out.println(o.getdate());
       System.out.println(o.getlocation());
       System.out.println(o.getprice());
       

	}

}


class Order{
	private int id;
	private int date;
	private String location;
	private int price;
	
	void setid(int i) {
		this.id = i;
	}
	int getid() {
		return id;
	}
	
	void setdate(int dt) {
		this.date = dt;
	}
	int getdate() {
		return date;
	}
	
	void setlocation(String loc) {
		this.location = loc;
	}
	String getlocation(){
		return location;
	}
	
	void setprice(int pr) {
		this.price = pr;
	}
	int getprice(){
		return price;
	}
}

# test2 java
public class Test2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		Customer c1 = new Customer();
		c1.setname("raj");
		c1.setId(100);
		
		System.out.println(c1.getname());
		System.out.println(c1.getId());

	}

}

class Customer{
	private String name;
	private int Id;
	
	void setname(String n) {
		name = n;
	}
	String getname() {
		return name;
	}
	
	
	void setId(int id) {
		Id = id;
	}
	int getId() {
		return Id;
	}
	
}



# spring boot project

WebCalc

src
com.example.demo

WebCalculator.java class


package com.example.demo;

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.GetMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PathVariable;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;



@RestController
public class WebCalculator {
	
	/*
	@GetMapping("WebCalc/welcome")
	String welcome()
	{
		return "welcome to WebCalc";
	}
	
	
	@GetMapping("WebCalculator/add/{a}/{b}")
	int add(@PathVariable("a") int a, @PathVariable("b") int b)
	{
	return a+b;
	}
	
	@GetMapping("WebCalculator/sub/{a}/{b}")
	int sub(@PathVariable("a") int a, @PathVariable("b") int b)
	{
	return a-b;
	}
	
	@GetMapping("WebCalculator/mul/{a}/{b}")
	int mul(@PathVariable("a") int a, @PathVariable("b") int b)
	{
	return a*b;
	}
	
	@GetMapping("WebCalculator/div/{a}/{b}")
	int div(@PathVariable("a") int a, @PathVariable("b") int b)
	{
	return a/b;
	}

   */
	@GetMapping("calc/{operationType}/{a}/{b}")
	int calculation(@PathVariable String operationType,@PathVariable int a,@PathVariable int b)
	{
		if(operationType.equals("add"))
		{
		return a+b;
		}
		if(operationType.equals("sub"))
		{
		return a-b;
		}
		if(operationType.equals("mul"))
		{
		return a*b;
		}
		if(operationType.equals("div"))
		{
		return a/b;
		}
		return 0;
		
		
	}
}


# Netbanking project name
src
com.exam

bank11.java


package com.example.demo;

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.GetMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PathVariable;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

@RestController
public class bank11 {
	
	@GetMapping("Bank/welcome")
	String welcome() {
		return "welcome to the bank portal";
	}
	
	@GetMapping("Bank/deposite/{acNo}/{amount}/{sign}")
	String deposite(@PathVariable int acNo,@PathVariable int amount,@PathVariable String sign)
	{
		return amount + "is deposited int u r account no = " +acNo;
	}
	
	@GetMapping("Bank/OpenAccount/{name}/{address}/{adhar}/{pan}/{age}/{mbNo}/{email}/{sign}")
	String OpenAccount(@PathVariable String name,String address,String adhar,String pan,int age,int mbNo,String email,String sign) 
	{
		return "u r account is opend";
	}
	
	

}


#BankingService.java

package com.example.demo;

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.GetMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PathVariable;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

@RestController
public class BankingServices {
	@GetMapping("bank/deposite/{accno}/{amount}/{sign}")
	String deposit(@PathVariable int accno,@PathVariable int amount,@PathVariable String sign){
		//logic
		return "amount = " + amount  + "is deposited in accno = " + accno ;
		
	}
	@GetMapping("bank/withdrawl/{accno}/{amount}/{pin}")
	String withdrawl(@PathVariable int accno, @PathVariable int amount,@PathVariable int pin) {
		
		return "amount is withdrawl =" + amount;
	}
	

}




OrderManagement project name

Orderdetails.java class

package com.example.demo;

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;
@RestController
public class Orderdetails {
@PostMapping("addorder")
String addorder(@RequestBody order o) {
	return "ordername : " + o.getName() 
	+"\n date : " + o.getDate()
	+"\n price : " + o.getPrice()
	+"\n add : " + o.getAdd();
			
}
}


class order{
	private String name;
	private int date;
	private int price;
	private String add;                                                                                                                                                                     String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public int getDate() {
		return date;
	}
	public void setDate(int date) {
		this.date = date;
	}
	public int getPrice() {
		return price;
	}
	public void setPrice(int price) {
		this.price = price;
	}
	public String getAdd() {
		return add;
	}
	public void setAdd(String add) {
		this.add = add;
	}
	
	
}


StudentManagement project

StudentController.java class

package com.example.demo;

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

@RestController
public class StudentController {
	@PostMapping("addStudent")
	String addStudent(@RequestBody Student s) {
		
		StudentService ss = new StudentService();
		return ss.addStudentInDB(s);
	}

}

class StudentService{
	
 String addStudentInDB(Student s) {
  if(s.getAge() < 18) {
	  
	return "not elligible";
  }
  return "added";
 }
}


student.java class
package com.example.demo;

public class Student {
	private String name;
	private String email;
	private int age;
	
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public String getEmail() {
		return email;
	}
	public void setEmail(String email) {
		this.email = email;
	}
	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}
	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}
	

}

# CustomerManagement
src
com.example.demo

CustomerController

package com.example.demo;

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

@RestController
public class CustomerController {
	
	@PostMapping("addCustomer")
	String addCustomer(@RequestBody Customer c)
	{
	 if(c.getAge()< 18)
	 {
		return "customer is not elligible";
	 }
		return "customer added";
	}

}

#Customer.java
package com.example.demo;

public class Customer {
	private String name;
	private int age;
	private int cid;
	private int mNo;
	private String email;
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}
	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}
	public int getCid() {
		return cid;
	}
	public void setCid(int cid) {
		this.cid = cid;
	}
	public int getmNo() {
		return mNo;
	}
	public void setmNo(int mNo) {
		this.mNo = mNo;
	}
	public String getEmail() {
		return email;
	}
	public void setEmail(String email) {
		this.email = email;
	}
	
	
}

#CustomerService11 project name

CustomerDetail.java


import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

@RestController
public class CustomerDetail {
	@PostMapping("savecus")
	String savecustomer( @RequestBody  Customer c)
	{
		return "Name: " + c.getcname() + "\nAddress: " + c.getadd() ;
	
	}
	

	
	//Cutomer c = new Customer();

}

class Customer
{
	private String cname;
	private String add;
	
	public void setcname(String c)
	{
		cname = c;
	}
	String getcname()
	{
		return cname;
	}
	
	public void setadd(String a)
	{
		add = a;
	}
	String getadd()
	{
		return add;
	}
}


HospitalManagement springboot project

src
com.demo.java

doctor1.java

package com.example.demo;

public class doctor1 {
	private String name;
	private String email;
	private int age;
	private String Spl;
	private String education;
	private int experience;
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public String getEmail() {
		return email;
	}
	public void setEmail(String email) {
		this.email = email;
	}
	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}
	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}
	public String getSpl() {
		return Spl;
	}
	public void setSpl(String spl) {
		Spl = spl;
	}
	public String getEducation() {
		return education;
	}
	public void setEducation(String education) {
		this.education = education;
	}
	public int getExperience() {
		return experience;
	}
	public void setExperience(int experience) {
		this.experience = experience;
	}

	
	
}

# DoctorController1.java
package com.example.demo;

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

@RestController
public class DoctorController1 {
	
		@PostMapping("adddoctor1")
		String adddoctor1(@RequestBody doctor1 dr1) {
			
			doctor1Service ds = new doctor1Service();
			return ds.adddoctor1InDB(dr1);
		}

	}

class doctor1Service{
		
    String adddoctor1InDB(doctor1 dr1) {
	  if(dr1.getExperience() < 3) {
		  
		return "not elligible to do surgery";
	  }
	  return "added";
	 }
	}



#DoctorController.java

package com.example.demo;

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

@RestController
public class DoctorController {
	@PostMapping("savedr")
	String savedoctor( @RequestBody Doctor dr)
	{
		return "Name: " + dr.getname() + "\nAddress: " + dr.getaddress() + "\nEmail: " 
				+ dr.getemail() + "\nSpecialization: " + dr.getspecialization() + "\nMobileno:" + dr.getmobileno();
	}
	
	
	
	
}

class Doctor
{
	private String name;
	private String address;
	private String email;
	private String specialization;
	public int mobileno;
	
	
	public void setname(String n)
	{
		name = n;
	}
	String getname()
	{
		return name;
	}
	
	public void setaddress(String a)
	{
		address = a;
	}
	String getaddress()
	{
		return address;
	}
	
	public void setemail(String e)
	{
		email = e;
	}
	String getemail()
	{
		return email;
	}
	
	public void setspecialization(String spec)
	{
		specialization = spec;
	}
	String getspecialization()
	{
		return specialization;
	}
	
	public void setmobileno(int mobno)
	{
		mobileno = mobno;
	}
	int getmobileno()
	{
		return mobileno;
	}
	
	
	
}


#schoolmanagement project
com.example.demo.controller
ResultController
StudentController
TeacherController



TeacherController


package com.example.demo.controller;

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.GetMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestBody;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

import com.example.demo.entity.Teacher;
import com.example.demo.service.TeacherService;

@RestController
public class TeacherController {
	@PostMapping("addTeacher")
	String addTeacher(@RequestBody Teacher t)
	{
		
		TeacherService ts= new TeacherService();
		               ts.saveTeacherInDb(t);
		               
		               
		return "teacher added in db";
	}
	
	@GetMapping("getTeacher")
	Teacher getTeacher() 
	{
		
	   Teacher t = new Teacher();
	           t.setName("seema hadke");
	           t.setDepartment("IT");
	           t.setEmail("seema@gmail.com");
	           t.setEducation("BE IN CS");
	 
	   return t;
	}

}
	

com.example.demo.entity
Result
Student
Teacher

Teacher
package com.example.demo.entity;

public class Teacher {
	private String name;
	private String department;
	private String email;
	private String education;
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public String getDepartment() {
		return department;
	}
	public void setDepartment(String department) {
		this.department = department;
	}
	public String getEmail() {
		return email;
	}
	public void setEmail(String email) {
		this.email = email;
	}
	public String getEducation() {
		return education;
	}
	public void setEducation(String education) {
		this.education = education;
	}
	

}


com.example.demo.service
ResultService
StudentService
TeacherService


TeacherService

package com.example.demo.service;

import com.example.demo.entity.Teacher;


public class TeacherService {
	
public	String saveTeacherInDb(Teacher t) 
{
	if(t.getEducation()== "BE IN CS")
	{
	   return "teacher is elligible to teach student";
	}
	return "not elligible";
	}

}
